DOC.brief_summary: Patients treat Extracorporeal Membrane Oxygenation ( ecmo ) severe respiratory circulatory failure show severe long term disability due impair lung - , cerebral- , cognitive function impair quality life . This study investigate long term outcome patient still alive three year ECMO treatment severe respiratory failure H1N1 2009 pandemic Karolinska University Hospital .
DOC.brief_title: Long Term Follow Patients Who Were Treated With Extracorporeal Membrane Oxygenation Pandemic Influenza A/H1N1 Induced Severe Respiratory Failure
DOC.criteria: Survivors ECMO treatment influenza a/h1n1 pneumonia 2009/2010 pandemic ECMO Center Karolinska
